channel.title: Michel de Bree
channel.description: Recent content on Michel de Bree

item.description: Michel de Bree Freelance Full Stack Java Developer With 15+ years of experience in complex and dynamic IT landscapes, I am equiped to help you build your automated solutions in an agile and sustainable way. Currently working with the following techniques: Scrum / Agile SAFE Java 11 / Spring Boot / Hibernate / PostgreSQL ReactJS / REST / JSON / HAL / SOAP / OAuth / JWT / OpenAPI (Swagger) Kubernetes / Docker / Openshift / Linux JUnit / Mockito / Jest / Chai / Enzyme / Wiremock / Cucumber / Gherkin Git / Bitbucket / Gitlab / Maven / Jenkins / JIRA / Nexus / SonarQube Personal Information Year of birth: 1972 Residence: The Hague / The Netherlands Languages: Dutch (native), English (fluent) E-mail: michel@micheldebree.
